name: Snaphost_HKCU_Explorer_Run
pattern: {"query": "select name,type,data from registry where key='HKEY_CURRENT_USER\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Policies\\Explorer\\Run';", "interval": 28800, "description": "Returns the content of the key HKCU_Software_Microsoft_Windows_CurrentVersion_Policies_Explorer_Run - ATT&CK T1060", "snapshot": true}
